summary: Juliana  was Queen of the Kingdom of the Netherlands, from her mother's abdication in 1948, to her own in 1980.
full_text: The Grand Duchy of Mecklenburg-Schwerin was a territory in Northern Germany held by the House of Mecklenburg residing at Schwerin. It was a sovereign member state of the German Confederation and became a federated state of the North German Confederation and finally of the German Empire in 1871.
title: Mecklenburg-Schwerin
